page.title: 10Stockbridge Downs
page.content: Stockbridge Downs are owned by the National Trust. The Downs is used for walking dogs.It has a lot of tall grass and some of it is short grass for picnickers.When you walk on the Downs on the hills you can see for miles, you can see Leckford Golf Course and if you follow Woolbury Ring round you come to a white horse. Riding on the Downs is great fun there are lots of places to gallop and canter.Really you are not supposed to gallop on the Downs but some people do. You have to be careful of the rabbit holes there because the horse could break a leg. The Stockbridge Downs is used for walking,kite-flying,horse-riding and tobogganing in the winter by many people in the area.
